1.name: Broken Road
desc: This section of the town has gone into disrepair and is slowly being
drowned by the nearby swamp to the south, that is creeping slowly
towards the town.  Several large caved in buildings lay in
fragments all over the place, torn apart by the elements, as well as
some form of conflict.  There is a large sign here, which you should read
if you want to avoid losing all your items.
The buildings are what seem to have been ones made for the production of
siege equipment as well as hand-to-hand weapons.  Since the weakening
of the Temple of Evil, buried in the swamps, there has been little
need of such a large production of equipment.
"	The sign reads:
Beware all you who enter!  The swamp is not for anyone without VERY
good armor and just a whole lot of hit points.

exits.desc: The road leading back to Midgard lies to the north...
A broken road leading southward into the marsh...

2.name: Swamps Edge
desc: You stand on a broken road way southeast of town.  Briars and marsh plants
stick to your boots and clothes, and clouds cover the skies above the murky
marsh.. leaving the path before you dark and sinister.  You see some
disturbances in the marsh a few hundred feet to the east, but after a few
strangled screams, the sounds stop.

extra.desc: A variety of plant life seems be trying to attach itself to you.
They look dark and sinister, and somewhat unnatural.

exits.desc: To the north you see some decrepit old buildings laying in ruin..
To the east lies a series of bogs and shallows that look rather threatening.
You notice a large hill rising out of the marsh to the south.

3.name: Marshy Forest
desc: This area is by no means a forest, but for those who dwell in these sparse
trees it is one.  Occasionally you see a humanoid form floating face down in
the murky waters, but most the time you only find pieces.  You hear a loud
bellow in the distance.  And feel fear creep into your heart.
You see a few arms and legs and some unrecognisable parts floating in the
water.
He looks rather mangled and shredded. You see one large gash mark that looks
like it came from the claw of some huge beast.

exits.desc: Eastward is the thick bog of ooze...

desc: Westward lies the remnants of a broken and shattered roadway being swallowed
by the marsh.

4.name: On a hill
desc: You stand atop a hill on the northwestern side of the evil swamp. Dark
clouds whip around you and the wind raises its sound less voice and
assails you.

exits.desc: To the north lies a damp broken roadway.
A dark pool congeals to the east.
A gloomy path through the marsh.

5.name: An Oozing Bog
desc: You stand in an oozing quagmire, A creaking beat fills the air,
accompanied by groans and a soughing of the air.  Several large winged
beasts flap over you and send chilling glares your way.  You feel out
of place, and feel that the occupants of this realm will soon
have you for a feast.

extra.desc: You see a large possibly demon type creature flapping heavily above you.

exits.desc: Eastward lies a horde of disgusting looking monsters.
Westward lies a marshy area.

6.name: Evil Horde
desc: There are a huge assortment of strange beasts and demons dwelling here,
hopefully you have a means of teleporting out of this area as all
passage from this area seems to be blocked by the horde.  The ground here
is still soft but has much more stability than the previous areas
you have passed through.

extra.desc: The limb looks like it is attached to a trap door in the ground.

7.name: Thing's lair
desc: A horrible swamp thing resides here.  Bones and mutilated corpses litter the
area, leaving you sick to your stomach, the stench is unbearable.
You notice a note on one of the corpses it says : "Best ye forget the temple,
it is not for the likes of you...

8.name: Pool of quick sand
desc: You stand by a large oozing pool of quick sand.  Luckily only a complete
clutz could not avoid it.  Dancing lights fly about you and one seems to
be taunting you towards the pool.

extra.desc: It looks deadly to the foolish.
From the stories you have heard, you recognize them as will-o-wisps

exits.desc: The swamp thing's lair.
A dark pool lies to the west.

9.name: A dark pool
desc: You stand beside a large dark pond.  The water boils not with heat, but with
motion, as if it is alive.  A creaking beat pulses through the air, leaving
you with a cold sweat and fear in your heart.

exits.desc: A large pool of quicksand lies to the east.
You sense an evil presence to the south... amidst a black cloud of darkness.
A hill rises out of the swamp to the east.

10.name: Gloomy path through the marsh
desc: To the north lies a hill, shrouded in dark clouds, and to the south lies
a huge patch of vegetation.  You sense an evil presence and notice
a beast flying over head to the south east, towards what looks to be a
huge fortress, half buried in the marsh.

extra.desc: The clouds look dark and foreboding.

exits.desc: To the north a hill protrudes from the marshes.
To the south a huge mass of vegetation seems to quiver with life.

11.name: Cloud of darkness.
desc: As you travel through this cloud of darkness, a fear such as you have never
known before, assails you.

exits.desc: A dark pool lies to the north.
An obelisk lies to the south.

12.name: Near Vegetation from hell
desc: You stand near some of the strangest plant life you have ever seen.  There
seems to be a mixture of vegetable and fruit tree's as well as just plain
fern's and some other indescribable life forms.  Some of the plants seem
to be hostile.

extra.desc: They look rather violent, and snap at you when you come near.

exits.desc: To the north is a gloomy path through the marsh.
Eastward is a large, black stone monolith.

13.name: By the Monolith
desc: You are standing near a monolith, which protrudes some 20 feet from the
marsh into the air.  It's black obsidian surface shines darkly in the
strange, almost unearthly light that enters through the clouds above.
This huge monolith resembles nothing you have ever seen before.
You have a strong feeling not to go within.

exits.desc: To the north is a cloud of darkest evil.
Eastward lies a murky bog.

14.name: Murky Bog
desc: A murky bog surrounds you, to the east a Monolith juts forth from the ground.
And far to the north lies a huge pool of quicksand.  Snarls can be heard
echoing as if from a great distance, and you look up to see a pit fiend
flapping steadfastly by.
It snarls at you, spits in your direction and flaps its way back to the
fortress.

extra.desc: This is a huge obsidian stone block stuck in the marsh.

exits.desc: To the east the marsh turns into a small lake.
Westward a Large monolith awaits adventurer's.

15.name: Northern Lake side
desc: Floating on this boiling lake is not what you would consider an enjoyable
experience.  Many a creature bumps the bottom of your boat, and glares
at you through unblinking eyes from the waters below.  The Southern
portion of the lake looks calm and serene compared to this wild place.

extra.desc: A wide (yes Very wide) variety of wild life swimming about below you.

exits.desc: The southern portion of the lake lies to the south.
To the west lies a murky bog.

16.name: Southern Lake side.
desc: You are floating on a calm section of a blue crystal clear water.  You
feel much more at ease then you were before in this area.  Then a wave
of fear passes over you.  You are not alone.

exits.desc: To the west is a beach where your boat can land.

17.name: Beach
desc: You are on a sandy shore, marsh life is creeping all across the surface,
To the west lies the Evil fortress, you see figures walking along the
battlements and also a pit fiend landing atop one of the many buildings
protected by the huge almost-one-hundred-foot-high-wall.
It is hewn of black stone, and fortified like nothing you have ever dreamed
of.

exits.desc: To the east lies the Southern portion of a small lake.
To the west lies a Huge fortress.

18.name: Before the Great Gates.
desc: "   You are standing in front of the gates of a ruined
fortress.  Looking through the gates you see a large
forest stretching into the distance.  The gates
of the old fortress are barely hanging and the
wood of the drawbridge are tattered and rotten
but you can just pass with care.

exits.desc: To the east is a marshy beach.

20.name: The room
desc: "  You don't know what this room is supposed to be, but look!  something is
here!
